sentences.english: Laid-off workers are also included in the numbers listed.
sentences.chinese: 本表职工数包括在岗和离岗人员。

sentences.english: A sentry was posted at the entrance to check the passes.
sentences.chinese: 在门口设了岗，检查出入证。

sentences.english: No. 2 bus form Wujiagang to Three gorges guesthouse.
sentences.chinese: 二路公共汽车是从伍家岗到三峡宾馆的。

sentences.english: The captain posted guards at the door.
Global China Insurance Co. Automobile Insurance survey will damage assessment post internship for 5 months.
sentences.chinese: 泛华保险公估有限公司车险查勘定损岗实习5个月。

sentences.english: They are the last line, they have no way to retreat.
sentences.chinese: 他们是最后一道岗，他们无路可退了。

sentences.english: And do you make good use of the ones that you have?
sentences.chinese: 你是否已经合理使用了那些在岗测试员呢？

sentences.english: Granite-porphyry stock is ore-forming parent rock.
sentences.chinese: 成矿主要与燕山期花岗斑岩体有关。

sentences.english: A soldier is expected to stand to his post whatever danger threatens him.
sentences.chinese: 不管遇到什么样的险情，士兵都应该站好岗。

sentences.english: Global China Insurance Appraisal Co. , Ltd. Automobile Insurance survey will practice 5 months post loss.
sentences.chinese: 泛华保险公估有限公司车险查勘定损岗实习5个月。

sentences.english: After sightseeing, have lunch with Bhaktapur yogurt.
sentences.chinese: 参观完毕之后会提供午餐，附带巴德岗酸奶。

sentences.english: A: We requite all our employees to arrive for work on time and we insist that they keep their lunch hours to a reasonable length.
sentences.chinese: 我们要求员工准时到岗，而且午餐的时间不要过长。

sentences.english: The Fangshan granodiorite pluton of Lower Cretaceous occupies the middle of core.
sentences.chinese: 核部有强力侵位的早白垩世的房山花岗闪长岩株。

sentences.english: Governor Zhou talked with clients at "Able Women Post" in Wealth Management Center.
sentences.chinese: 周强在中行财富管理中心巾帼建功文明岗与客户交谈。

sentences.english: Train team leaders and operators for OJT and keep training record.
sentences.chinese: 对组长和操作工进行在岗培训，并保留记录。

sentences.english: Private Affair Leave means the time that the employee does not go to the post in legal working days because of private affairs.
sentences.chinese: 是指因个人私事在法定工日未到岗工作的时间。
